sentences.en: How does the author view the hitherto high click-through rates?
sentences.cn: 作者如何看待迄今为止的高点击率？

sentences.en: Hitherto he had thought it was some fiend fighting him, but darker suspicions assailed him now.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，他一直以为是魔鬼在跟他搏斗，但现在更阴暗的怀疑向他袭来。

sentences.en: In himself, too, he knew that it was vibrating at last, that chord hitherto dormant and unsuspected.
sentences.cn: 在他自己心里，他也知道那根弦终于在颤动了，那根弦一直蛰伏着，不曾被察觉。
